last_episode_to_air.name: Hot Springs Party Place
last_episode_to_air.overview: After receiving an inheritance, a mother and son look to honor a loved one with the vacation party palace he always wanted in Hot Springs, Arkansas. David arrives to search for beautiful lake front properties big enough to accommodate family and friends.

name: My Lottery Dream Home

next_episode_to_air.name: Mega Mountain Dreams
next_episode_to_air.overview: A couple missed winning a $1.6 billion jackpot by one number, but they did have all the numbers to win $1 million dollars! Now, they're calling on David to help realize their dream of owning a mountain lodge in the gorgeous forests of New Hampshire.

overview: David Bromstad takes recent lottery winners on over-the-top house hunts for their new dream homes. Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find their Lottery Dream Homes.

episodes.name: A Big Home for a Big Prize
episodes.overview: Rick & Lorie won the Lottery's Mega Millions jackpot of $180 million dollars and are looking for their dream home in Riverside County, California. Host David Bromstad is asked to find a modern, country style home to make Millionaire memories. It should include a large amount of acreage, a big kitchen, 6 or more bedrooms and a place for Lorie's Dad to call home.

episodes.name: A Lottery Winner's Dog House
episodes.overview: Joe & Rhonda won $11.7 million in the Minnesota Lottery and are looking for a new dream home near beautiful Stillwater. Host David Bromstad travels back to his birth state to help the couple search for a mansion in the range of $2.5 million. He needs to find a treasure with an open floor plan, a big kitchen, up to 40 acres, 4 bedrooms and hopefully a big enough barn for Rhonda's hobby sport of agility training for German Shepherds.

episodes.name: Dream Home and Wedding Venue
episodes.overview: Design expert, David Bromstad takes New Jersey's newest Lottery winners on a tour to find an amazing new Dream Home. They have a total of $7 million to spend but will they choose $1.65 million 'Old Indian Estate', the historical 'Llewellyn Carriage House', or brand new build 'The Ryserson' in their old neighborhood? Whatever they choose, it's going to be fabulous.

episodes.name: Dreaming on the Chesapeake Bay
episodes.overview: A retired couple that loves to spend holidays with family wins $1 million in the North Carolina Powerball and can finally buy the vacation home of their dreams. David Bromstad gets the chance to show them some gorgeous properties along the Virginia coast, all of which would be great for their family, but will they prioritize size over having a great view?

episodes.name: California Dreaming
episodes.overview: Josh lives in the fast lane when it comes to motorcycles, but after winning $5 million on a scratch-off ticket, he wants nothing more than to slow down on a piece of property in California. He's always dreamed of living on a big piece of land and David Bromstad is there to show him just how much land $5 million can buy. With his new budget and David's help, Josh and his young family will have only the top choices to fulfill all their California dreams.

episodes.name: Music City Dream Home for Kansas Lottery Winners
episodes.overview: A Kansas couple wins $1 million on a Powerball ticket, and now they're finally ready to move to their dream city, Nashville, Tennessee. David Bromstad will help them find a dream home big enough to host their five grown children.

episodes.name: Lucky in Louisville
episodes.overview: Lady Luck visited Todd when he bought a lottery ticket on the way home from his daughter's baby shower. He won $700,000 and is now able to provide a beautiful home to help raise his daughter near family and friends in Louisville, Kentucky. Expert designer David Bromstad shows Todd a variety of homes to choose from, making the decision a tough one for this new dad.

episodes.name: A Little Piece of Quiet in Indiana
episodes.overview: Craig was couch surfing and living paycheck to paycheck when he was given the second chance of a lifetime: a million-dollar prize for winning a Hoosier Lottery second-chance drawing. He can now buy the land he's wanted in the peace and quiet of rural Indiana. David Bromstad shows Craig some beautiful properties that meet his needs, but will he choose a move-in ready, a fixer-upper or a historic home?

episodes.name: Utah Mountain Dream Home
episodes.overview: Nelly and Pablo were married for just a few months when they won $1 million in the Wyoming Powerball. Now they can afford their dream home in the mountains of Utah, and they're looking for a place that's big enough for their whole extended family. Interior designer David Bromstad joins the couple in their house hunt, along with their teenaged niece, Shania, who has some ideas about what kind of house is suitable for her millionaire relatives. But how far into the mountains are they willing to go?

episodes.name: Paradise in Puerto Rico
episodes.overview: Ana and Rafael had always planned on retiring from their life in New York City to paradise in Puerto Rico. When Ana won $1 million, they found they were able to take early retirement and buy their dream home sooner rather than later. Host David Bromstad takes the winners on tours of various homes in Puerto Rico to find out if they prefer a modest house close to friends, a modern stunner they can style themselves or an elegant, move-in ready guesthouse.

episodes.name: Coast of Dreams
episodes.overview: Massachusetts native Linda was unable to afford buying her own home until she won $4 million on a scratch card. Now she can buy her own dream home in her hometown. Host David Bromstad helps Linda decide whether she wants an oceanfront view or a backyard for visiting grandchildren now that she's a millionaire four times over!

episodes.name: Show-Me State Dream Home
episodes.overview: After a $3 million scratcher win, a family of three can finally move from their one-bedroom rental to their dream home in Missouri. They want a big house with a big yard, and David Bromstad shows them some huge properties with all the bells and whistles.

episodes.name: Sweet Dream Home Alabama
episodes.overview:
Season 2, Episode 10

Sweet Dream Home Alabama

Kathy and her son, Gene, pooled their money to buy a lottery scratcher while living in California. After winning $1 million, they've decided to return to their Southern roots by moving back to Tallassee, Alabama. They want to live the Southern lifestyle of their dreams -- fishing for Gene and painting for Kathy. Designer David Bromstad shows them some tempting properties, but will this mother and son ever agree?

episodes.name: The Good Life in Nebraska
episodes.overview: After winning a million dollars on a Missouri Powerball Quick Pick, Carla can finally buy her dream home in Nebraska. But can David Bromstad find it with a dining area large enough to seat over 25 family and friends during the holidays?

episodes.name: A Home on the Cape
episodes.overview: A mother and her two grown daughters find out how far their $1 million lottery win will take them in Cape Cod, Massachusetts. David Bromstad shows them some beautiful properties with enough space for all three to spread their wings, but which one will tempt them enough to buy?

episodes.name: Texas Beach House
episodes.overview: After becoming a millionaire on a Vegas slot machine, Rick immediately buys his own dream home. Now. David Bromstad joins him in Galveston, Texas, to help him spend his extra cash on a Texas Beach House for the whole family.

episodes.name: The Long Island Dream
episodes.overview: After winning $3 million on a scratcher, a couple can afford to buy a home in their old neighbourhood of Northport, Long Island; they must decide if they want to purchase a waterfront property or get more value for their money away from the coast.

episodes.name: Ten Million to One
episodes.overview: Demolition man John beat the odds and won $10 million on a Massachusetts scratcher. Now, he's ready to kick off his work boots and retire into flip-flops in Hollywood, FL. David Bromstad shows him properties fit for a millionaire who wants to relax and entertain his friends from Boston.

episodes.name: IT Geek to Rich and Chic
A Home on the Cape: Revisited
Big Sky Dream Home
episodes.overview: Montana residents Daniel and Marcia won $1 million in the state lottery and can now afford to buy a dream home in Big Sky country to accommodate their big family! The only problem is that Daniel wants a ranch on a whopping 200 acres of land, but Marcia would like something more manageable. David Bromstad gets to explore some new territory north of Billings, Montana, to show them properties of varying sizes in the quest to find their Big Sky dream home.

episodes.name: Lucky in Lafayette
episodes.overview: This Louisiana man was homeless and crashing on his son's couch when he won $2 million; now David Bromstad is helping the lucky overnight millionaire find the perfect property in Lafayette where he can party with his family and enjoy his fortunes

episodes.name: Some Like it Hotter
episodes.overview: After their retirement got a lot warmer with a $1-million New York scratcher win, a couple is following their best friends to Punta Gorda, Fla., where they hope David will help them buy into a classy retirement village.

episodes.name: Reinvention in Las Vegas
episodes.overview: After winning big on a scratcher, a California single mom is ready to leave her mobile home, job and old life behind for a new start in Las Vegas; David is ready to show her three very different locations to see which one is just right.

episodes.name: Fort Worth Fortune
episodes.overview: A professional poker player and his family are looking for their ultimate dream home in Fort Worth, Texas; David Bromstad's expertise is needed to find a place big enough to fit dad, mom and their three small children.

episodes.name: Winning Big in Florida
episodes.overview: A man who won big is ready to buy a new home in Cape Coral, Fla., with his wife; they look to David Bromstad for his real estate expertise; David finds potential properties with reasonable price tags and breathtaking scenic waterways.

episodes.name: Delaware Dream Home
episodes.overview: David Bromstad helps a fun-loving Staten Island couple find their forever home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Del.

episodes.name: Make Me a Millionaire
episodes.overview: David Bromstad helps a young family of four search the suburbs outside Boston for the perfect family dream home with lots of elbow room and a yard big enough for a swing set and pool.

episodes.name: Virginia Beach Forever
episodes.overview: After serving in the U.S. Air Force for six years, a couple decides to look for their dream home in the military-friendly town of Virginia Beach, Va.; with a $100,000 settlement to be used for a down payment, David helps them on their house hunt.

episodes.name: Newlywed Millionaires
episodes.overview: After these newlyweds bought a lotto ticket at a gas station, they filled up both their gas tank and their bank account; the instant millionaires are now searching for their dream home in Columbus, Ohio, where they can start a family.

episodes.name: Winner Winner Chicken Dinner
episodes.overview: Patty won a million dollars on a scratch-off and is beside herself with excitement to find the house of her dreams with the help of David Bromstad. Patty and her sister-in-law target the upmarket suburb of Spring Hill, Florida, for their search. David has some fabulous houses up his sleeve and can't wait to explore this part of Florida, which is known as the "Adventure Coast" and is only a short drive from Tampa.

episodes.name: The Great American Dream Home
episodes.overview: Brenda and Jesse were living in a tiny apartment in Columbus, Ohio, when they won a million-dollar lottery. Now, David Bromstad takes them on an emotional and memorable journey to help them find their American dream home.

episodes.name: Bangor or Bust
episodes.overview: Nick won $100,000 from a scratch off and now he and his wife Robyn want to buy their forever home in Bangor, Pennsylvania. David Bromstad is challenged to find them a single-family home on a very small budget, and to make it even tougher, they want a three-car garage.

episodes.name: Follow Your Nose
episodes.overview: After winning $1 million on a Powerball ticket, a couple calls on David to find their forever home. The house must come with a particular smell, however, challenging David to find one that passes her sniff test.

episodes.name: A Slice of New Jersey Paradise
500,000 Reasons to Party
episodes.overview: A Wisconsin mom is ready to ditch her tiny apartment after winning $500,000 on a scratch off. Now that her kids have left the nest, this house hunt is all about her and she asks David Bromstad to find a home with space to entertain friends and family.

episodes.name: The Lottery Queen
episodes.overview: An avid gambler won $500,000 on the Illinois lottery and is ready to hunt for a townhouse with David Bromstad. She wants a fixer-upper so she can put her own stamp on the home, but David may persuade her to buy a fully renovated property.

episodes.name: Mountain High Dreams
episodes.overview: A Florida couple receives an inheritance from a long-lost relative that leaves them $900,000 richer. They struggle to agree on a budget for a mountain vacation home in Blue Ridge, GA, so David Bromstad steps in to help them find something they both love.

episodes.name: Holiday Extravaganza
episodes.overview: David Bromstad and his Christmas helpers surprise his family with a spectacle of everything fun and festive! Using amazing tree designs, novelty garland, baked decorations and blankets of snow, David shares his tips for staging fabulous holiday decor.

episodes.name: First-Time Forever Home
episodes.overview: David Bromstad heads to Dallas, Texas, to meet a couple who won the lottery in life and love! David has to be on his A-game because between this pair's construction and inspection experience, they really know what to look for in their forever dream home.

episodes.name: A Spacious Win
episodes.overview: A single mom won $3 million on the lottery and wants more space after sharing an apartment with her three growing girls. With four ladies to please, David Bromstad has his hands full finding a home with rooms for everyone and space to spread out.

episodes.name: G'ma's Pad
episodes.overview: With 37 piercings, 89 tattoos and endless wigs, David Bromstad has never met a winner like this grandma! She wants a big house so her elderly mother can move in with a yard to fill with grandkids, and David has a $200,000 budget to find her perfect home.

episodes.name: Vacation Time at the Cape
episodes.overview: A Massachusetts couple has been vacationing with their family in Cape Cod for over 30 years, and thanks to a scratch-off jackpot, they're buying a dream home there! David must work fast to help them snatch up their perfect place in this hot market.

episodes.name: King and Queen of M'Orlando
episodes.overview: David gets to stay at home as he helps lucky newlyweds find their dream home in Orlando, Florida. After winning a million dollars on their anniversary, this couple wants a two-story house where they can feel like royalty overlooking the neighborhood.

episodes.name: Gone Fishin' for a Dream Home
episodes.overview: After a $250,000 scratch-off win, a couple of empty nesters is finally moving back to her native Mandeville, Louisiana. While they need a fabulous in-law suite and plenty of space for visitors, David also has to find a home with a fishing hole nearby.

episodes.name: So Young, So Rich
episodes.overview: In North Carolina, David helps his youngest winner yet put her $390,000 towards buying a home to share with her mom and sister. There aren't many 22-year-olds with a property portfolio, so David is thrilled to find a home with pretty livestreaming spaces.

episodes.name: Million-Dollar Wonderland
episodes.overview: After winning big on a scratch-off, a couple is all smiles as they hunt for their dream home near Canton, Ohio. David braves the cold to help them find the perfect compromise between city and country living in a snow-covered winter wonderland adventure.

episodes.name: Border Town Bonanza
episodes.overview: David meets his newest winners in the semi-rural countryside of the border between New York and Canada. Despite the winter chill, they're looking forward to the summers as they search for a home with country charm and a pool.

episodes.name: Million-Dollar Baby
episodes.overview: Thanks to a million-dollar win on a scratch-off, a couple and their baby can finally move out of their one-bedroom apartment. David is happy to help this family find a bigger home hear Binghamton, New York, even if he does struggle with the city's name.

episodes.name: Six Million Reasons to Smile
episodes.overview: The Florida lottery gives a couple of government employees a fabulous early retirement gift of six-million dollars! With their teens in tow, David shows the whole family how to revel in luxury as they embark on a spree full of sun, sand and lavish homes.

episodes.name: From Portland to Paradise
episodes.overview: A Portland man was homeless when he inherited $1.4 million after his mother passed away. Now, he and his partner are moving to warm Cape Coral, Florida, and David is ready to find them a house where they can fish, boat and soak up the sunshine in style!

episodes.name: A Million-Dollar Hug
episodes.overview: After tragically losing a husband and father, a mother and her two daughters are given a million dollars of comfort thanks to a scratch ticket. Ready to find their dream home in Leechburg, Pennsylvania, David leads the way one silly walk after another.

episodes.name: Mortgage Free in Atlanta
episodes.overview: After winning $1 million, a San Francisco family decides they want to live mortgage free and buy a huge home in Atlanta. They're looking for a place with a few projects and a big yard, and David shows them just how far their money can go in the suburbs.

episodes.name: To Son, With Love
episodes.overview: A devoted grandma won $1 million on a quick pick, and now she wants her youngest son and his family to find their own home in Bridgeport, Connecticut. Only an hour out from NYC, David starts searching for some surprising fixer uppers to stay on budget.

episodes.name: Seven Million Big Ones
episodes.overview: Two New York EMTs have dedicated their lives to helping others, but with a lotto win under their belts, it's their turn for some self care! David helps them find a Florida dream home in Cape Coral where the warm waters aren't far from their front door.

episodes.name: Cashed Up in Cartersville
episodes.overview: After winning $2,000,000 on a scratcher, a Florida couple is moving the whole family to just outside of Atlanta. David's shocked at how much house they can buy close to a major city as this family decides between a five-acre yard and a six-bedroom home.

episodes.name: California Dreams
episodes.overview: After a five-million dollar scratch-off win, a family of five can finally move out of the two bedroom apartment they share with three dogs. David helps them navigate the expensive and exclusive California market for a home that has a room for everyone!

episodes.name: Oh, My Goodness!
episodes.overview: After winning $5 million on a scratch ticket, two empty nesters are gifting their children with their dream forever home. David takes this generous couple on an adventure through New York's Hudson Valley where they are wowed by every property they see.

episodes.name: Rags to Riches
episodes.overview: Thanks to a million-dollar scratch-off, a couple that was living paycheck to paycheck can finally move out of their one-bedroom apartment! David tours his neighborhood of Winter Park, Florida, as they search for a home with their very own lawn to mow.

episodes.name: Massachusetts Millions
episodes.overview: Two Bostonians couldn't have wished for a better start on the property ladder than a share in a million-dollar lotto win. With David as their guide, they tour gorgeous century-old houses full of history and possibly ghosts in Salem, Massachusetts.

episodes.name: For Lovers and Lottery Winners
episodes.overview: Richmond is for lovers and winners now that a couple is using their $100,000 win to put a down payment on their first family home in Virginia. David narrows down the options with a house that has separate rooms for the kids and a backyard for family time.

episodes.name: A Fistful of Friendship
episodes.overview: A Bingo player who won a $60,000 progressive jackpot is making a down payment on a home closer to her BFF in Phoenix. David Bromstad joins these lifelong pals as they search for a home with a spare room for sleepovers and plenty of space for entertaining.

episodes.name: Millionaire Mama
episodes.overview: After raising three girls in a small Miami apartment, a single mom is looking forward to spending her million-dollar win on the home of her dreams; She's hoping for a standalone home, but David knows some gorgeous townhouses that may change her mind.

episodes.name: Heartfelt Inspiration
episodes.overview: Three years after facing unbelievable tragedy, a couple picks up the pieces and moves to a dream home in Burleson, Texas. David is eager to help them find the perfect place so they can start the area's first female-run brewery.

episodes.name: Philly to Fayetteville
episodes.overview: A $2 million win came at the perfect time for a couple who relocated from Philadelphia to take care of their family in Fayetteville, North Carolina. Now, David helps them track down the right home for hosting weekend barbecues with their 10 grandkids.

episodes.name: Million Dollar Angel
episodes.overview: When a selfless Massachusetts woman and family caretaker wins $2 million, it means a brighter future for her whole household. David takes her on an adventure through Plymouth, as they encounter cranberry bogs, historic homes, and farmyard animals.

episodes.name: Second Chance Lottery
episodes.overview: After a close call with a motorcycle accident, a New York couple credits "My Lottery Dream Home" marathons as their motivation to get through rehabilitation. David is happy to help them find their own dream home in sunny St. Augustine, Fla.

episodes.name: Quick Cash in Cedar Rapids
episodes.overview: A family of six was saving for a down payment on their first home when they won $100,000 on a scratcher. With the boost to their budget, David takes them on a tour of family-friendly areas in Cedar Rapids, Iowa, that are close to schools and golf courses.

episodes.name: Knock Knock, It's a Million Dollars!
episodes.overview: After 30 years, a couple got a knock on their door that came with a giant check for $1,000,000! Now, they're moving to Columbia, South Carolina, and they need David's help finding a dream home big enough to host their massive family for the holidays.

episodes.name: Blended Bliss in New Hampshire
episodes.overview: Busy raising her three kids in Burlington, Massachusetts, a woman is ready for a change of pace after a $2,000,000 lottery win! She's ready to move in with her fiance, so David shows them some adorable family homes just across the border in New Hampshire.

episodes.name: Tri-State Scratch King
episodes.overview: The self confessed "Scratch King" of the Midwest has won a total of $600,000 on two different scratchers. Now, David helps this contractor and single dad find a move-in ready home he can enjoy with his five-year-old son in the Sioux Falls tri-state area.

episodes.name: Must Love Goats
episodes.overview: Through difficult circumstances, a single man gets an unexpected windfall and now he's ready to find his dream home. David searches California's Central Valley to find a peaceful place where he can host guests, settle down and maybe start his own family.

episodes.name: Bangor Bucks
episodes.overview: A mother wins big on a scratcher, but since she already has her dream home, she has decided to help her daughter find hers. The duo enlists David to get her growing family out of a cramped apartment and into a house with more space in Bangor, Maine.

episodes.name: South Beach Birth Rite
episodes.overview: When a Miami, Florida, native received an inheritance, she knew it was time to find a vacation condo in South Beach! It's where she and her best friend grew up and made great memories, so now she needs David's help to find a place to rest and reminisce.

episodes.name: Wonderland in Maine
episodes.overview: A Massachusetts couple finds hope and happiness with an inheritance and looks to relocate. Now, David helps them begin a new chapter by searching for homes in the picturesque town of Bath, Maine, including a sprawling eight-bedroom mansion!

episodes.name: The Akron Bunch
episodes.overview: A couple scratched up a sweet $150,000 win, and now they're ready to blend their two big families together. With seven kids between them, including two sets of twins, David is tasked with finding a family home large enough for nine in Akron, Ohio.

episodes.name: Million Dollar Mom
episodes.overview: A million dollar scratcher win in Florida gave a California native all the riches she could imagine. Now, David is enlisted to find a home for her daughter's family so they can finally make the cross-country move and be together once again.

episodes.name: New Money, New York City!
episodes.overview: After winning $1000 dollars a day for life, a Texas native bought his family a dream home in Houston. Now, he's calling on David to search exclusive New York City real estate to find a luxurious Manhattan apartment fit for a lottery winner.

episodes.name: Ain't Nothin' But a Corn Dog
episodes.overview: A Bosnian couple has been living the American dream for over 20 years, and their luck continues after scratching up a $100,000 win! Now, David helps the couple upgrade and search for a larger home for his mother and their teenage sons in Grimes, Iowa.

episodes.name: Second Chances All Around, in Bangor
episodes.overview: After a second chance drawing, a couple wins a whopping $250,000 on an original losing ticket! Now, David is challenged to find a spacious home fit for their growing family, including a garage large enough for his racecars, in Bangor, Maine.

episodes.name: Lisa's Little Luxuries
episodes.overview: After a lifetime of apartment living, a family can finally buy their first home after a $4 million win! David is tasked with finding a home with a backyard, a laundry room that doesn't require coins, and other little luxuries in Nashua, New Hampshire.

episodes.name: Winter Wonderland
episodes.overview: A couple scores a $1 million jackpot on a $30 scratcher, and now they're ready to find a vacation home for wilderness fun! Winter sports are their favorite hobbies, and now David is tasked to find a mountain getaway on Moosehead Lake in Greenville, Maine.

episodes.name: Carolina Beach Legacy House
episodes.overview: A couple decides to invest an inheritance in a beach house that can be a legacy home for the entire family. They want something that's quirky, and they need David's help to search for just the right place in Carolina Beach, North Carolina.

episodes.name: First-Time Millionaires!
episodes.overview: A young couple wins big and are ready to start building a life together and find a first home they can renovate; David arrives with plenty of ideas and helps explore options in the picturesque town of Rochester, N.Y.

episodes.name: My Big Island Dream Home
episodes.overview: After receiving an inheritance, a couple looks to leave Oklahoma and find their dream home in Hawaii; they're searching for a place big enough to host family for holidays, and David makes a trip to the Big Island to help them find the perfect place.

episodes.name: A Snowbirder's Florida Haven
episodes.overview: Thanks to a family inheritance, a Midwestern couple are ready for the relaxing vibes of central Florida; they're bringing in David to help search for their forever home, and now it's a decision between a golf course view and a relaxing rural outlook.

episodes.name: Lake Cumberland Dreaming
episodes.overview: Thanks to a $5 million scratcher win, a couple is ready move from city life in Cincinnati to lake life in Lake Cumberland, Kentucky. They're looking to move back where he spent his summers as a kid, and now David helps find the lake house of their dreams.

episodes.name: Texas Tranquility
episodes.overview: After an unexpected inheritance, a woman is finally able to buy a home near her daughter and grandchildren. She wants a house that's no more than 10 minutes away from her family, and now, David is tasked with finding the perfect place in Houston, Texas.

episodes.name: Luck Comes in Pairs
episodes.overview: A couple were thrilled when their son struck it big and won $100,000, and a year later, they won a whopping $2 million themselves! Now, they're calling on David to help find a forever home where their lucky family can relax in Richmond, Virginia.

episodes.name: Anything You Want in Vermont
episodes.overview: After receiving a family inheritance, ex-Long Island residents now see an opportunity to buy a property in their much loved Vermont. David steps in and finds character-filled homes full of variety and charm in the breathtaking mountain landscape.

episodes.name: The Wizard of Cape Coral
episodes.overview: David's back in Cape Coral, Florida, to find his newest winners a coastal dream home. But since his last visit, Hurricane Ian left a path of destruction and limited housing. Now, with some courage, heart, and a lot of smarts, David makes dreams come true!

episodes.name: Pennies from Heaven
episodes.overview: After a terrible tragedy, a couple feels as if the universe stepped in to deliver a gift in the form of a $10 million scratch off. Now, David is honored to help them search beautiful properties in the military town of Jacksonville, North Carolina.

episodes.name: Big Kona Energy
episodes.overview: A couple were married in Hawaii 18 years ago, and after winning $5 million on a scratcher, they're moving to the Big Island. With a huge budget, David searches for incredible properties with ocean views, and takes in the Big Kona energy along the way.

episodes.name: Myrtle Beach Moves
episodes.overview: When a Pennsylvanian woman received an inheritance, it gave her the opportunity to move to the warm shores of Myrtle Beach, South Carolina. Now, David helps her and her bestie navigate beach real estate to find her forever home.

episodes.name: Rubber City Band Aid
episodes.overview: A couple living in her grandmother's tiny two bedroom house has never had the means to buy their own home, until they won $1 million on a scratcher. Now, David searches Akron for a home with a big backyard and enough space to host band practice.

episodes.name: Living Large in Lubbock
episodes.overview: Thanks to an inheritance, a longtime Georgia resident has the chance to buy a large family home closer to her grown-up children in Lubbock, Texas. David shows her some beautiful, spacious places where the houses are big but the prices are small.

episodes.name: Friendly Kenly
episodes.overview: A couple battling an illness was in a terrible place financially and physically, so when they scratched a million dollars, they knew it was the answer to their prayers. Now, David steps in to help find the perfect place for them to recuperate.

episodes.name: Memphis Family Ties
episodes.overview: First cousins and BFFs grew up like sisters, so when one gets the chance to buy a family home, the other gets a room of her own...and a bathtub! It's David's first trip to Memphis, and he's searching for the grand, sprawling house of their dreams.

episodes.name: Bustle to the 'Burbs
episodes.overview: A mom used her son's birth date as inspiration to buy a scratch off ticket, and it won her a million bucks! She's ready to get out of the city and into the suburbs, but with low inventory, David will need his own good luck charm to find her dream home.

episodes.name: Nove Scotia Homecoming Queen
episodes.overview: With a lottery win in her pocket and a baby just around the corner, a woman is ready to move back home to Shelburne, Nova Scotia, Canada. Affordable oceanfront properties are on David's list, and he's on call to help her find the cutest dream home ever!

episodes.name: Second Home Sanctuary
episodes.overview: A couple decides to sell their inherited farmland in Iowa and buy a cabin in Minnesota for family and friends to gather and celebrate holidays. And for David, it's a chance to return to his childhood home to help them find the perfect lakeside property!

episodes.name: I'm Italian, I Cook Sauce!
episodes.overview: A couple caring for elderly parents couldn't afford a home for themselves until fate stepped in and he won a million dollars on a scratcher. Now, David searches for a well-appointed condo with a huge kitchen so she can cook her famous Italian Bolognese!

episodes.name: City Mouse vs. Country Mouse
episodes.overview: A couple with a $2 million budget is ready to find their dream home, but she's a city mouse and her husband prefers the country. Unable to reach a decision, they've asked David for help finding a house with a lot of space for him, and some bling for her.

episodes.name: Million Dollar Start
episodes.overview: A North Carolina local received the best present ever by winning a million dollars just before his 27th birthday. Now, David steps in to help him discover some beautiful homes south of Raleigh, along with great shopping and design tips to help him decide.

episodes.name: PS, I Love You
episodes.overview: As the beneficiaries of their brother's estate, a pair of siblings want to pay tribute to their desert-loving brother and buy a dream home in Palm Springs, California. David is tasked to find the perfect place, and it needs to include a mountain view.

episodes.name: St. Paul Homecoming
episodes.overview: When a Minnesota born woman won $200,000, she knew that she wanted to go back home! Her and her sister are pooling their money to buy a forever home in St. Paul, and David couldn't be happier to help in the search while checking in with his own family.

episodes.name: Tappahannock Is for Lovers
episodes.overview: A couple met as he was recovering from a devastating injury, and now with a big lottery win, they're ready to find a dream home in Tappahannock, Virginia. They want a quiet, small-town life, so David sets out to find the perfect country home.

episodes.name: Gold Lady of Lake Mendota
episodes.overview: A Wisconsin woman didn't hit the lottery, but she hit the jackpot with a savvy investment that paid off to the tune of eight figures! Now, David has the largest budget he's ever been given and looks to find her the ultimate lakefront mega-mansion!

episodes.name: Family Bonds
episodes.overview: Siblings inherited money from their late brother, and after finding one a home in Palm Springs, David's ready to help the other locate a place of his own. And for David, it's a desert oasis exploration as he hunts for a stunner in the Coachella Valley.

episodes.name: Below Dock
episodes.overview: A woman was left an inheritance from her parents and has decided to honor their memory with buying a generational vacation home on the Emerald Coast. David embarks on a pilgrimage for perfection as he searches for some real waterfront showstoppers.

episodes.name: Rolling in It on the Texas Plains
episodes.overview: A stargazing couple got set up for life when they struck it lucky and won $3.5 million in the Texas lottery! Now, David is enlisted to help find a dream home just outside of Lubbock, Texas, that's perfect for gazing the stunning expanse of stars at night.

episodes.name: Small Town, Big Dreams
episodes.overview: After winning $1 million on a scratcher, a couple is ready to find a home outside their tiny town of Wilmot, Ohio. David steps in to search the surrounding areas for a home that has a big yard for their grandson and two Jack Russell terriers to enjoy.

episodes.name: Newlywed and Cashed Up in Richmond
episodes.overview: After winning a whopping $2 million, a couple is on the hunt for a big and flashy forever family home. With flamboyant outfits and dance moves, David arrives to discover brand new communities south of Richmond where he searches for a gem of a house.

episodes.name: The Gold Lady of Naples
episodes.overview: After already spending over $5 million on her dream lake house in Wisconsin, a woman now asks David to find a dream vacation home in Naples, Florida. She's bringing her sister along as David looks for super-bougie properties in luxury golfing communities.

episodes.name: Low Country Comfort
episodes.overview: Connecticut teachers struck it lucky just when they were ready to retire! Now, David helps realize their dream of finding a forever home in the beach loving, low country of South Carolina where there's lots of water, boating and gorgeous scenery.

episodes.name: Pensacola Peanuts
episodes.overview: Gold star do-gooders who have struggled financially scratch up a $5 million win, and they barely know what to do with it! David steps in to make sure they spend some money on themselves and help find their dream home in Pensacola, Florida.

episodes.name: Happy Dance in Tennessee
episodes.overview: Previous $1 million winners call on David to help find a second dream home near Nashville! They're looking for a picturesque place that's quiet and close to family, but the hardest part is deciding on a house while performing their signature happy dance!

episodes.name: Pine Island Prince and Princess
episodes.overview: Santa delivers big when a Massachusetts couple finally scratches off a $4 million win on Christmas Day! They want a vacation spot that can eventually be their retirement home, so they're enlisting David to find the perfect place on Pine Island, Florida.

episodes.name: Hot Springs Party Place
episodes.overview: After receiving an inheritance, a mother and son look to honor a loved one with the vacation party palace he always wanted in Hot Springs, Arkansas. David arrives to search for beautiful lake front properties big enough to accommodate family and friends.

episodes.name: Mega Mountain Dreams
episodes.overview: A couple missed winning a $1.6 billion jackpot by one number, but they did have all the numbers to win $1 million dollars! Now, they're calling on David to help realize their dream of owning a mountain lodge in the gorgeous forests of New Hampshire.

episodes.name: Brent's Bounty
episodes.overview: For someone who rarely plays the lottery, a single dad struck it lucky when a scratcher won him $10 million! After taking care of his loved ones, he's now turning to David to find a family dream home with a sparkling pool in gorgeous Visalia, California!
